
```{r, 'bi-poa-table'}
bi_poa_table %>%  
  mutate(
    Parameter = str_replace(Parameter, "x", "&#215;"), 
    Metric = case_when(
    identifier == "VOT_Intercept" ~ "VOT", 
    identifier == "COG_Intercept" ~ "COG", 
    identifier == "KT_Intercept" ~ "KT", 
    identifier == "RI_Intercept" ~ "RI", 
    identifier == "SD_Intercept" ~ "SD", 
    identifier == "SK_Intercept" ~ "SK", 
    TRUE ~ " ")) %>% 
  select(-identifier) %>% 
  knitr::kable(format = "pandoc", 
    align = c("l", "l", "r", "r", "r", "r"), 
    caption = "Model summary for VOT and burst metrics as a function of 
               language (English, Spanish), place of articulation (bilabial, 
               coronal), F1, F2, and item repetition for bilingual voiceless 
               stops. The percentage of the HDI contained within the ROPE is 
               based on an effect size of &plusmn; 0.1.", 
    label = "bi-poa-table")
```
